ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Well, I had a very enjoyable nite playing with a Shaman Ogre. He roleplays his char quite well and it was really enjoyable to play with some1 who roleplays
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,
Well, I had a very enjoyable nite playing with a Shaman Ogre. He roleplays
his char quite well and it was really enjoyable to play with some1 who
roleplays even if it's just semi roleplaying. Trust me give roleplaying a
try. Turn off the shout if u don't like it. But then again u would want to
heard the Dorn incoming!! Run for ur lifes!!
heheh ^_^


At 06:06 PM 4/28/99 +0800, Wilson wrote:
> This is actaully what I see... <> <><> <> hunting party.
> ----- Original Message ----- From: Entreri To:
>sg-everquest@onelist.com Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 1999 10:12 PM
>Subject: [sg-everquest] Re: (no subject)
> Not at all,hehe..I rather like all the information thats been pumping
>up for the past few days :) Though I would like to know if there are
>players here that actually ROLE-PLAY their characters meaning 1.I
>would never see a DarkElf cleric curing an elf :) 2.An orge getting
>killed for a damsel in distress 3.Some dwarf that said someone called
>him on his mobile phone I would love to see ppl doing that :)
